title: Sex Quests: Two Tales of Futures Possible
description: SEX QUESTS Two Tales of Futures PossibleGene Raid In a post-global-warming Far North, three adventurers leave their isolated valley in search of wives to replenish their people's in-bred gene pool. Tricked by Arctic Ocean fishermen, chased off by caribou hunters they have helped fight an enemy, they are enslaved by a cruel society, where they meet the wild horse-women of their dreams. Escape will require ingenuity, daring, courage. Natural Woman In a world where you can 3D-print your house, where plastic surgery and genetic science make any unnatural body-type, plant, or animal imaginable possible, a natural young woman is trying to find herself-when she spots the natural man of her dreams. Finagling her way upwards through the rigid hierarchy of society to locate him, she learns something about society, herself, and life.
author: Theodore Irvin Silar
